name: Merfolk Palaces
description: Magnificent underwater structures built by merfolk create unique environments and potential sources of royal treasures. The underwater location creates unique exploration challenges, while the royal nature can provide access to valuable artifacts or political influence.
atmosphere: Magnificent coral palaces house merfolk royalty while melodic voices echo through the underwater halls. Royal architecture displays underwater grandeur as ancient treasures fill the chambers. Political intrigue and cultural exchange opportunities. Underwater civilization with its own customs and laws.
